title: Crypto Needs Congress, But U.S. Lawmakers Have Opted for Pandemonium
description: Without the U.S. Congress outlining a clear system of rules, the crypto industry fears it’ll be relegated as a volatile financial backwater. But Capitol Hill is beset by drama, including a U.S. House of Representatives that fired its speaker and a budget debate that could derail the federal government.

title: The Ethereum Foundation Just Sold $2.76 Million in ETH
description: It’s magnitudes smaller than previous transfers, but historically when the Ethereum Foundation moves ETH it’s been bearish.

title: Crypto Market Recap Q3, 2023
description: Crypto experienced a further decline in Q3, 2023. During the summer, there was a gradual cooling of the crypto market, with most assets losing value throughout the quarter.

title: Rapid Evolution in Labor Market: AI Skills and Collaborative Leadership in High Demand
description: In the ever-evolving landscape of the global labor market, the past decade has witnessed a profound transformation, primarily driven by the relentless march of automation technologies. title: Israel’s Advanced AI Integration and U.S. Funding Highlighted Amidst Ongoing Conflict
description: Israel has declared a state of war following a militant attack by Hamas on border towns in the early hours of Saturday. title: Apple Bolsters UK Presence with New AI Hub in Cambridge
description: Apple is set to strengthen its foothold in the United Kingdom with the inauguration of a new office in Cambridge, emphasizing its commitment to advancing AI and machine learning technologies. The move comes as part of Apple’s ongoing efforts to bolster its presence in the UK, which includes investments in a six-story UK headquarters and ... Read more

title: AI Chatbots Show High Creativity, But Humans Still Shine in Divergent Thinking Test
description: In a groundbreaking study, researchers have uncovered the intriguing dynamics between human creativity and artificial intelligence (AI). While AI chatbots, especially ChatGPT4, demonstrated exceptional creativity, they did not consistently outperform the most creative human participants. Instead, humans showcased a wider range of creative potential, potentially linked to variations in executive functions and cognitive processes. Traditionally, ... Read more

title: AI Boosts Fashion Creativity: Designers Remain Central in the Process
description: AI is making waves in the fashion industry, but its role is seen as a complement to designers’ creativity rather than a replacement, according to Calvin Wong, the brains behind the world’s first designer-led AI system, the Interactive Design Assistant for Fashion (AiDA). AiDA leverages image-recognition technology to expedite the journey from initial sketch to ... Read more

title: EU market drives 90% of inflows as crypto investments soar to $78m
description: Cryptocurrency investment products reached their highest volume since July 2023, totaling $78 million. Coinshares reported that the volumes of crypto exchange-traded products (ETPs) increased by 37%, reaching nearly $1.1 billion. The report also stated that Solana hit its highest level…

title: Solana’s Game-Changing Update: Native Support for Private Blockchain Transactions – A New Rival to Monero, Dash, and ZCash
description: Solana blockchain has undergone a game-changing upgrade that will see it support user privacy through “confidential transfers.” This upgrade sees the blockchain expand into a new market and compete with privacy-focused blockchains such as Monero and ZCash. title: CyberConnect’s 11.42% Token Release Sparks Market Volatility
description:

title: 72.5% of the Top Video Game Companies Have Ventured Into Web3
description:
According to CoinGecko, a leading cryptocurrency aggregation platform, 72.5% of the top video game companies by market cap have ventured into Web3. Some of the top companies listed in this category include Microsoft, Tencent, Sony, NetEast, and Nintendo. title: Crypto Analyst Warns Chainlink (LINK) Inflation Could Hold Back Altcoin’s Price Next Bull Run
description:
